description: Main source file for the Flutter-based Monthly Budget Tracker app, defining themes, models, state management, UI screens, and core app logic.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines color constants for the app's 'Ocean Professional' theme.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: Model representing a budget category with id, name, icon, and color.

classes.name: BudgetTransaction
classes.description: Model representing a financial transaction with associated details.

classes.name: MonthlyBudget
classes.description: Model representing the budget for a specific month including category budgets.

classes.name: SeedData
classes.description: Provides seed data for categories, transactions, and initial monthly budget.

classes.name: BudgetState
classes.description: State management class holding categories, transactions, budget data, and user preferences.

classes.name: BudgetApp
classes.description: Main widget integrating theme, navigation, and app state.

classes.name: StatCard
classes.description: Reusable widget displaying a statistic with title, value, icon, and color.

classes.name: CategoryRingChart
classes.description: Custom painted widget rendering a ring chart to visualize category distribution.

classes.name: _RingPainter
classes.description: CustomPainter responsible for drawing the ring chart arcs.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Overview screen presenting total spend, remaining budget, and category distribution.

classes.name: MonthSelector
classes.description: Widget allowing users to select month and year for filtering transactions.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Displays transactions for selected month and shows details in a bottom sheet.

classes.name: _showDetails
classes.description: Helper method to show detailed info about a transaction in a modal bottom sheet.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Allows editing overall and per-category budgets.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: Provides app settings such as theme toggling and currency selection.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the app, runs the BudgetApp widget.

methods.name: fmtMoney
methods.description: Formats a double amount into a currency string with currency symbol.
